text:
-Why?
-Oh.

It's time
for your punishment, buddy,

so we're just gonna
clean you up.

-Close your eyes.
-Oh!

-What the [bleep]?
-Oh!

Are you serious?
What are you doing?
Sit back and relax.

Let me take your eyebrows off.
Just relax.

Shave my eyebrows off?
Are you kidding me?!

It's my nephew's confirmation
in two weeks.
I'm his sponsor.

[ Laughs ]
Oh, my God!

Oh.
[ Laughs ]

-Stay still or it'll hurt.
-Lean back, all right.

-Oh! [ Laughs ]
-Close your eyes.

[ Laughing ] Oh, my God.
Are you serious?
Come on!

What does it look like
right now?
Aaah!

Oh, my God.
I look like Lex Luthor.
[ Laughter ]

It took three months
for my eyebrows to grow back.

I was my nephew's confirmation
sponsor in church.

So I had to stand
in front of a church

of 1,000 people
with no eyebrows,

saying I'd defend him
against Satan

while looking like
Satan!
[ Laughter ]
Three months.

So, for $2,000, talk to through
and lock in where you think

losing your eyebrows
lands on the Misery Index.

That's temporary. It's low.
It's low. It's low.
It doesn't hurt.
It's embarrassing over time

'cause when you don't
have eyebrows

for a few months,
it's kind of embarrassing.

But beyond that,
it's nothing too severe.

Okay, well, everyone,
I'm gonna need you to lock in.

-What did you think?
-I like that.
Okay, everyone is locked in.

Let's see who has
mastered the misery

by being the closest
to the correct answer.

Priscilla, you said losing
your eyebrows is at a 27.
And Ange, you put it at a 38.
Let's see what our shrinks say.

Who's moving on
to the next round?

-Ange!
-Come on!

-Ange, Ange, Ange, Ange!
-Come on!
[ Dinging ]
[ Cheers and applause ]
